evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: How long did I yearn for one of these? Just putting it on makes me feel... ready.

evidences.name: Smith's Autopsy Report
evidences.description1: The time of death was around 2 AM, April 17. Death caused by a single blow to the forehead.

evidences.name: Crime Photo 1
evidences.description1: The sub-basement at the Borscht Bowl Club. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Deadly Bottle
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Payne.
evidences.description1: Grape juice bottle used as the murder weapon. Bears the defendant Mr. Wright's prints.
evidences.description2: Grape juice bottle used as the murder weapon. Mr. Wright's prints on it are upside-down.

evidences.name: Wright's Cell Phone
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
evidences.description1: Used by the defendant to notify the police from the restaurant's first floor.

evidences.name: Olga's Photo
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Olga Orly.
evidences.description1: The defendant & Mr. Smith at the Borscht Bowl Club. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Chip Photo
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Payne.
evidences.description1: Defendant & victim's chips when crime took place. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Crime Photo 2
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Payne.
evidences.description1: Photo of forehead. Hat removed during investigation. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Wright's Hand * (Wright's hand and Victim's hand are in fact two different pieces of evidence, with Wright's hand being entirely optional. )
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
evidences.description1: Defendant Wright's hand. Was left at the scene. A full house.

evidences.name: Victim's Hand
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
evidences.description1: Victim Smith's hand. Was left at the scene. A full house.

evidences.name: Bloody Ace
evidences.description1: Received from a mysterious girl. Could this be the missing "fifth ace"?

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: How long did I yearn for one of these? Just putting it on makes me feel... ready.

evidences.name: Map
evidences.description1: Shows the area around Mr. Wright's office. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Bowl
evidences.description1: Custom-made Eldoon's Noodles bowl. Decorated with the Eldoon's Noodles mascot.

evidences.name: Slippers
evidences.obtained: Retrieved from the entrance to People Park.
evidences.description1: Slippers for patients at the Meraktis Clinic. Was found in front of Kitaki Mansion.
evidences.description2: Slippers used by patients at the Meraktis Clinic. Big toe print found in left slipper.

evidences.name: Mirror
evidences.obtained: Retrieved from the entrance to People Park.
evidences.description1: Torn off the car that hit Mr. Wright. Was found in front of Kitaki Mansion.
evidences.description2: Torn off the car that hit Mr. Wright. Fits car at the Meraktis Clinic.

evidences.name: Cell Phone
evidences.description1: Found in the Meraktis Clinic garage beneath a car. Who could have dropped it?
evidences.description2: Found in the Meraktis Clinic garage beneath a car. Property of Wesley Stickler.

evidences.name: Trucy's Panties
evidences.description1: Prop for performing magic. Found in exhaust pipe of a car at the Meraktis Clinic.

evidences.name: Letter of Request
evidences.description1: Letter of request from Alita Tiala for the legal defense of her fiancé, Wocky Kitaki.

evidences.name: White Powder → Fingerprint Powder
evidences.description1: Mysterious white powder with the alleged ability to improve Detective Skye's mood.
evidences.description2: A memento of Wright and Skye. Examine fingerprints to detect and match prints.

evidences.name: Bloomers → Little Plum's Bloomers
evidences.description1: Found in a trash can at People Park. Distinctive bloomers, to say the least.
evidences.description2: Found in a trash can at People Park. Stolen by Wesley Stickler.

evidences.name: Knife
evidences.description1: Also known as a "shiv". Found at the crime scene bearing Wocky's prints.

evidences.name: Meraktis's Autopsy Report
evidences.description1: Time of death: June 14, after 10 PM. Cause of death: Single bullet to the right temple.

evidences.name: Noodle Stand
evidences.description1: Mr. Eldoon's noodle stand. Victim died pulling it.

evidences.name: Wocky's Check-Up Report
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Gavin.
evidences.description1: Results from a check-up performed in June. Metallic object found near heart.

evidences.name: Pistol
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Gavin.
evidences.description1: Weapon left at the crime scene. Two rounds were fired. Fingerprints were wiped.

evidences.name: Detective Skye's Orders
evidences.description1: "Allow clinic access to this magician and attorney, in Prosecutor Gavin's name."

evidences.name: Sandals → Alita's Sandals
evidences.description1: Cute women's sandals. Found in the Meraktis Clinic foyer.
evidences.description2: Women's sandals found in the Meraktis Clinic foyer. Big toe print found on left sandal.
evidences.description3: Present from Wocky, found in Meraktis Clinic foyer. Big toe print found on left sandal.

evidences.name: Lamp
evidences.description1: Found in the Meraktis Clinic office with a broken bulb and a red stain on the cord.

evidences.name: Wocky's Chart
evidences.description1: Found in the Meraktis Clinic safe.  Signed by nurse Alita Tiala.

evidences.name: Bullet
evidences.description1: Found in the Meraktis Clinic safe. Squished from impact with the back of the safe.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: How long did I yearn for one of these? Just putting it on makes me feel... ready.

evidences.name: Postcard
evidences.description1: Lamiroir's own publicity postcard. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Lyrics Sheet
evidences.description1: Contains the lyrics to Lamiroir's ballad. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Investigation Request
evidences.description1: Information concerning the crime to be restricted to police and related parties.

evidences.name: Brooch
evidences.description1: Found at the crime scene. Seems strangely familiar...
evidences.description2: Found at the crime scene. Turns out it belongs to Lamiroir.

evidences.name: Revolver
evidences.description1: The murder weapon.  A deadly, high-caliber revolver.
evidences.description2: The murder weapon. A deadly, high-caliber revolver belonging to Mr. LeTouse.

evidences.name: Key Ring
evidences.description1: Mr. LeTouse died clutching this. Note the heart-shaped ring.
evidences.description2: Found in the victim's left hand. Holds keys to a guitar case and a motorcycle.

evidences.name: Mixing Board
evidences.description1: Allows music to be played in separate tracks. Click here to use.

evidences.name: LeTouse's Autopsy Report
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Gavin.
evidences.description1: Death due to loss of blood from a gunshot wound. Est. time of death: 9:00-9:30 PM.

evidences.name: Crime Photo
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Gavin.
evidences.description1: Victim shot in shoulder in Lamiroir's room. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Diagram
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Gavin.
evidences.description1: The crime scene was Lamiroir's dressing room. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Video Tape
evidences.description1: Taped recording of Lamiroir's performance. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Headset
evidences.description1: Retrieved from Backstage Hallway. Receiver/transmitter for voice signals. All concert staff wore one.
evidences.description2: Receiver/transmitter for voice signals with a 30-foot range. All concert staff wore one.

evidences.name: Switch → Remote Trigger
evidences.description1: Found on the stage. It's a switch for something, and that's about all I know.
evidences.description2: Found on the stage. Triggers an igniter. Use with caution.
evidences.description3: Found on the stage. Triggers an igniter within 30 feet.

evidences.name: Forum Diagram
evidences.description1: Cross-section diagram of the Sunshine Coliseum. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Igniter
evidences.description1: Found at the crime scene. Emits a flame when triggered by remote control.
evidences.description2: Identical igniters in Gavin's guitar and at the crime scene. Triggered by "Remote Trigger".

evidences.name: Borginian Newspaper
evidences.description1: Article about the case. It doesn't mention the lyrics of Lamiroir's ballad.

evidences.name: Prosecutor Gavin's Guitar
evidences.description1: A gift from Lamiroir, sent from Borginia. Burned the night of the concert.

evidences.name: Replica
evidences.description1: Replica of something, held by Mr. LeTouse. Apparently the focus of his investigation.
evidences.description2: Borginia Cocoon replica, held by Mr. LeTouse.
evidences.description3: Replica of a cocoon from which a remedy for "incuritis" may be extracted.

evidences.name: Newspaper Article
evidences.description1: Article about the Chief Justice's son, who is inflicted with "incuritis".

evidences.name: Burnt Fragments
evidences.description1: Found at the crime scene, bearing a gunpowder residue. Possibly a firecracker?

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: How long did I yearn for one of these? Just putting it on makes me feel... ready.* (when playing as Apollo Justice)
evidences.description2: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.* (when playing as Phoenix Wright)

evidences.name: Magic Show Ticket
evidences.description1: For premier showing of a grand illusion, to be performed by the magician, Valant Gramarye.

evidences.name: Gramarye Envelope
evidences.description1: Envelope from Mr. Wright. Do not open until the time is right.

evidences.name: Vera's Card
evidences.description1: Defendant's business card. The address for Drew Studio is on the front.

evidences.name: Portrait
evidences.description1: Obtained at Drew Studio. That bit in the middle is supposed to be a person.

evidences.name: Acrylic
evidences.description1: Obtained at Drew Studio. An undersea scene in vivid colors.

evidences.name: Landscape
evidences.description1: Obtained at Drew Studio. Only half finished, the rough sketch is still visible.

evidences.name: Coffee Mug
evidences.description1: The victim's last mug of coffee. The scrawl on the side is Drew Misham's signature.
evidences.description2: Traces of the slow-acting deadly poison atroquinine were found on the rim.

evidences.name: Hidden Painting
evidences.description1: Found at Drew Studio. Notable for the large peach in the foreground.

evidences.name: Red Envelope
evidences.description1: Found in the victim's desk drawer. Appears to have been opened once and resealed.
evidences.description2: Found in the victim's desk drawer. Contains two sheets of writing paper.

evidences.name: Letter Box
evidences.description1: Drew Misham's contact with the outside world. It's empty.

evidences.name: Tiny Frame
evidences.description1: Frame measuring two inches by two inches. Bears traces of deadly poison atroquinine.

evidences.name: Brushel's Card
evidences.description1: This business card reads "Spark Brushel, Freelance Journalist".

evidences.name: Misham's Autopsy Report
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Gavin.
evidences.description1: Death by atroquinine poisoning. Estimated time of death: 9:00-9:30 PM.

evidences.name: Crime Photo
evidences.description1: Body found in hospital room, shot in the forehead. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Magnifi's Autopsy Report
evidences.description1: Cause of death: single gunshot to the head. Estimated time of death: 11:00-11:30 PM.

evidences.name: Notebook Page
evidences.obtained: Received from Trucy Enigmar.  → Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Gavin.
evidences.description1: Mysterious paper received just before the trial. Click here for details.
evidences.description2: Forged to look like a page of Magnifi's diary. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Magnifi's Chart
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Gavin.
evidences.description1: Diagnosed with a malignant tumor. Given 3 months. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Small Syringe
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Gavin.
evidences.description1: Used for administering insulin shots. Has been washed and shows no sign of use.

evidences.name: Magnifi's Letter
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Gavin.
evidences.description1: Letter asking Zak to shoot him. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Stage Pistol
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Fires one real bullet. Rifling marks match bullet found in victim. No fingerprints found.

evidences.name: Magnifi's Letter 2
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Gavin.
evidences.description1: Letter telling Valant to come at 11:20 PM. Click here for details.

evidences.name: IV Report
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Gavin.
evidences.description1: IV stopped 10 min. after administration began. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Magnifi's Diary
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Gavin.
evidences.description1: A memoir of sorts. Written in up to just before he died.

evidences.name: The Amazing Mr. Hat
evidences.description1: Trucy's favorite trick. Startlingly realistic.

evidences.name: Trucy's Locket
evidences.description1: Contains a photo of Trucy's mother, Thalassa.

evidences.name: Transferal of Rights
evidences.description1: Document tranferring the right to perform the Gramarye repertoire to daughter Trucy.

evidences.name: Nail Polish
evidences.description1: Retrieved from Kristoph Gavin's cell. The nail polish is colorless.

evidences.name: Commemorative Stamp
evidences.description1: Commemorative stamp showing Troupe Gramarye. Click here for details.
evidences.description2: Sent from the real "client". Click here for details.

evidences.name: Thalassa's Portrait
evidences.description1: Photo of a young Thalassa, Trucy's mother. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Zak's Confession
evidences.description1: Confession to the slaying of Magnifi Gramarye. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Letter from Misham
evidences.description1: Letter posted by Drew Misham just before dying. Poison traces found on the stamp.

evidences.name: Letter from Mr. Wright
evidences.description1: Reproduction of information found by Mr. Wright during his investigation.
